remarks: "Calemes", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic.  All ` ph ` is ` ps ` , and no ` ps ` is ` ch ` , therefore no ` ch ` is ` ph ` .  (In Aristotelian notation, AEE-4:  PaM and MeS therefore SeP.) (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 28-Aug-2016.)  (Revised by David A. Wheeler, 2-Sep-2016.)
statement:
calemes.maj $e |- A. x ( ph -> ps ) $.
calemes.min $e |- A. x ( ps -> -. ch ) $.
calemes $p |- A. x ( ch -> -. ph ) $.
